about_the_game:
The ultimate tank battle game, Clash of Panzer, is now available for download!
Join millions of players and enjoy the thrill of this fast-paced, action-packed online PvP battle game!
Choose from more than 400 legendary vehicles, including not only tanks, but also legendary armored vehicles and powerful helicopters, and engage yourself in the intense 12v12 real-time battles.
Get ready for epic clashes with players from all over the world and show off you skills in strategies.
Download Clash of Panzer now and conquer the battlefield like never before!




It is recommended to use Xunyou Accelerator.
Download Link:
The ultimate acceleration will allow you to conquer the battlefield at lightning speed and have an unprecedented experience!

We have our Discord server at Come and join us on Discord and exchange ideas with players from all over the world! You will have fun here.


[Lifelike Vehicles]
Kingtiger, Panther, T-72, T-90, Leopard II, Chieftain, AH-64, M2 Bradley, AH-1, UH-60 Black Hawk, etc. massive famous vehicles in history await your command!

[Combat Modes]
Single-player Combat, Team Battle and Campaign Mode, every mode has its own unique gameplay and goals. Nevertheless, destroying all enemies will always be the way to win without doubt!

[Various Tactics]
Every vehicle has multiple parts which can be upgraded. Raise the firepower of your tanks, improve the maneuverability of your armoured vehicles and the performance of your helicopters, and get into fast-paced multi-arms combats!

[International Teams]
Fight with your friends against players from every corner of the world. Hold your position, and then attack. We don’t have DEFEAT in our dictionary!

Download Clash of Panzer and enjoy the fun of warfare!

name: Clash of Panzer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the free-to-play tank battle game with a various selection of historical vehicles. Show your skills and fight with global players in thrilling, fast-paced, and action-packed PvP clashes. Have fun in the combination of strategies and actions!
supported_languages:
English, Ukrainian, Russian, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
